update.description:
add gazebo model for tranquillitatis pit exploration 
![lunar_pit.jpg](https://bitbucket.org/repo/bedE4R/images/2736326561-lunar_pit.jpg)


how to run:
```
$ cd <gazebo_models>
$ cat example.world
<sdf version="1.4">
  <world name="default">
    <!-- Gravity -->
    <physics type="ode">
      <gravity>0 0 -1.6350</gravity> <!-- 1/6 of 9.80665 -->
    </physics>
    <!-- A global light source -->
    <include>
      <uri>model://sun</uri>
    </include>
    <!-- A hightmap plane -->
    <include>                                                                                         
      <uri>model://lunar_tranquillitatis_pit</uri>
    </include>
    <include>
      <uri>model://pioneer2dx</uri>
    </include>
    <scene>
      <ambient>0.4 0.4 0.4 1.0</ambient>
      <background>0.1 0.1 0.1 1</background>
      <grid>false</grid>
      <sky>
        <time>13</time>
        <sunrise>12</sunrise>
        <sunset>12</sunset>
        <clouds>
          <humidity>0</humidity>
        </clouds>
      </sky>
   </scene>
  </world>
</sdf>

$ GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH=`pwd`/tateana roslaunch gazebo_ros empty_world.launch world_name:=`pwd`/example.world

```

we're assuming that you had manually appried https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/1430/preserve-previous-gazebo_model_path-values/diff

this model uses data from

*  http://wms.lroc.asu.edu/lroc/view_rdr/NAC_DTM_TRANQPIT1
*  http://lroc.sese.asu.edu/data/LRO-L-LROC-5-RDR-V1.0/LROLRC_2001/DATA/SDP/NAC_DTM/TRANQPIT1/NAC_DTM_TRANQPIT1_E080N0330.IMG
* http://lroc.sese.asu.edu/data/LRO-L-LROC-5-RDR-V1.0/LROLRC_2001/DATA/SDP/NAC_DTM/TRANQPIT1/NAC_DTM_TRANQPIT1_M152662021_50CM.IMG


see http://lroc.sese.asu.edu/posts/230 for scientific background
update.title: lunar tranquillitatis pit

content.raw:
yeah, we have to  run
```
cd /usr/share/gazebo-2.2/media/skyx/
sudo wget https://github.com/tork-a/hakuto/raw/master/tetris_gazebo/worlds/earth_from_moon_20071113_kaguya_03l.png
# sudo cp `rospack find tetris_gazebo`/worlds/earth_from_moon_20071113_kaguya_03l.png .
sudo cp SkyX_Moon.png SkyX_Moon.png.org
sudo ln -sf earth_from_moon_20071113_kaguya_03l.png SkyX_Moon.png
```
https://github.com/tork-a/hakuto/blame/master/tetris_launch/doc/sysadmin.rst#L126-L130

create ticket here
#!/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-requests/124/add-apollo15_landing_site/diff#comment-5486424
and put code to generate this model, basically you can create model of any place on the moon.
https://gist.github.com/k-okada/08d2450774cab9396d7ae1b1b84c028e
content.html:
yeah, we have to run

cd /usr/share/gazebo-2.2/media/skyx/
sudo wget https://github.com/tork-a/hakuto/raw/master/tetris_gazebo/worlds/earth_from_moon_20071113_kaguya_03l.png
# sudo cp `rospack find tetris_gazebo`/worlds/earth_from_moon_20071113_kaguya_03l.png .
sudo cp SkyX_Moon.png SkyX_Moon.png.org
sudo ln -sf earth_from_moon_20071113_kaguya_03l.png SkyX_Moon.png

https://github.com/tork-a/hakuto/blame/master/tetris_launch/doc/sysadmin.rst#L126-L130

create ticket here #!/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-requests/124/add-apollo15_landing_site/diff#comment-5486424 and put code to generate this model, basically you can create model of any place on the moon. https://gist.github.com/k-okada/08d2450774cab9396d7ae1b1b84c028e

add gazebo model for tranquillitatis pit exploration 
![lunar_pit.jpg](https://bitbucket.org/repo/bedE4R/images/2736326561-lunar_pit.jpg)


how to run:
```
$ cd <gazebo_models>
$ cat example.world
<sdf version="1.4">
  <world name="default">
    <!-- Gravity -->
    <physics type="ode">
      <gravity>0 0 -1.6350</gravity> <!-- 1/6 of 9.80665 -->
    </physics>
    <!-- A global light source -->
    <include>
      <uri>model://sun</uri>
    </include>
    <!-- A hightmap plane -->
    <include>                                                                                         
      <uri>model://lunar_tranquillitatis_pit</uri>
    </include>
    <include>
      <uri>model://pioneer2dx</uri>
    </include>
    <scene>
      <ambient>0.4 0.4 0.4 1.0</ambient>
      <background>0.1 0.1 0.1 1</background>
      <grid>false</grid>
      <sky>
        <time>13</time>
        <sunrise>12</sunrise>
        <sunset>12</sunset>

          <humidity>0</humidity>
        </clouds>
      </sky>
```

content.raw:
Awesome, I can see the moon from the moon!

![lunar.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/EgGzpd/images/4292994651-lunar.png)
content.html: Awesome, I can see the moon from the moon!

content.raw:
MEMO

confirmed with
```
$ GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=`pwd` GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH=`pwd` roslaunch gazebo_ros empty_world.launch world_name:=`pwd`/example.world
$ cat example.world
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<sdf version="1.4">
  <world name="default">
    <!-- Gravity -->
    <physics type="ode">
      <gravity>0 0 -1.6350</gravity> <!-- 1/6 of 9.80665 -->
    </physics>
    <!-- A global light source -->
    <include>
      <uri>model://sun</uri>
    </include>
    <!-- A hightmap plane -->
    <include>
      <uri>model://lunar_tranquillitatis_pit</uri>
    </include>
    <include>
      <uri>model://pioneer2dx</uri>
    </include>
    <scene>
      <ambient>0.4 0.4 0.4 1.0</ambient>
      <background>0.1 0.1 0.1 1</background>
      <grid>false</grid>
      <sky>
        <time>13</time>
        <sunrise>12</sunrise>
        <sunset>12</sunset>
        <clouds>
          <humidity>0</humidity>
        </clouds>
      </sky>
   </scene>
  </world>
</sdf>

```
content.html:
MEMO

confirmed with

$ GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=`pwd` GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH=`pwd` roslaunch gazebo_ros empty_world.launch world_name:=`pwd`/example.world
$ cat example.world
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<sdf version="1.4">
  <world name="default">
    <!-- Gravity -->
    <physics type="ode">
      <gravity>0 0 -1.6350</gravity> <!-- 1/6 of 9.80665 -->
    </physics>
    <!-- A global light source -->
    <include>
      <uri>model://sun</uri>
    </include>
    <!-- A hightmap plane -->
    <include>
      <uri>model://lunar_tranquillitatis_pit</uri>
    </include>
    <include>
      <uri>model://pioneer2dx</uri>
    </include>
    <scene>
      <ambient>0.4 0.4 0.4 1.0</ambient>
      <background>0.1 0.1 0.1 1</background>
      <grid>false</grid>
      <sky>
        <time>13</time>
        <sunrise>12</sunrise>
        <sunset>12</sunset>
        <clouds>
          <humidity>0</humidity>
        </clouds>
      </sky>
   </scene>
  </world>
</sdf>

update.description:
add gazebo model for tranquillitatis pit exploration 
![lunar_pit.jpg](https://bitbucket.org/repo/bedE4R/images/2736326561-lunar_pit.jpg)


how to run:
```
$ cd <gazebo_models>
$ cat example.world
<sdf version="1.4">
  <world name="default">
    <!-- Gravity -->
    <physics type="ode">
      <gravity>0 0 -1.6350</gravity> <!-- 1/6 of 9.80665 -->
    </physics>
    <!-- A global light source -->
    <include>
      <uri>model://sun</uri>
    </include>
    <!-- A hightmap plane -->
    <include>                                                                                         
      <uri>model://lunar_tranquillitatis_pit</uri>
    </include>
    <include>
      <uri>model://pioneer2dx</uri>
    </include>
    <scene>
      <ambient>0.4 0.4 0.4 1.0</ambient>
      <background>0.1 0.1 0.1 1</background>
      <grid>false</grid>
      <sky>
        <time>13</time>
        <sunrise>12</sunrise>
        <sunset>12</sunset>
        <clouds>
          <humidity>0</humidity>
        </clouds>
      </sky>
   </scene>
  </world>
</sdf>

$ GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH=`pwd`/tateana roslaunch gazebo_ros empty_world.launch world_name:=`pwd`/example.world

```

we're assuming that you had manually appried https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/1430/preserve-previous-gazebo_model_path-values/diff

this model uses data from

*  http://wms.lroc.asu.edu/lroc/view_rdr/NAC_DTM_TRANQPIT1
